article_title: Even More Time For ObamaCare Customers To Pay Premiums

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: A parade of health insurance companies this week once again extended the ability of new enrollees to pay their first month’s premium until later this month for those who signed up for individual policies under the Affordable Care Act. Some health plans originally were anticipating payments prior to the beginning of [...]
